<h2>Resume & Skills</h2>

 <a class="download-link" href="imgs/resume.pdf"><i class="fas fa-download"></i>Download Resume</a>
  

```{r, out.width='100%', fig.align='center', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


library(tidyverse)
library(highcharter)

skills <- read_csv("C:/Users/laryl/Downloads/data_skills.csv")

special_palette <-c("#1F2041", "#4B3F72", "#FFC857", "#4DA891", "#119DA4", "#19647E", "#417F95" )

my_theme <- hc_theme(
chart = list(
      backgroundColor = "transparent",
      style = list(
      fontFamily = "Libre Baskerville"
      )))

skills%>%
hchart(
    "packedbubble", 
    hcaes(value= Comfort,name = Skill, group = Tool)
    )%>%
  hc_plotOptions(
    packedbubble = list(

      layoutAlgorithm = list(
        gravitationalConstant =  0.07,
        bubblePadding = 8,
        splitSeries = TRUE,
        seriesInteraction = FALSE,
        dragBetweenSeries = FALSE,
        maxIterations = 500
      )
    )
  )%>%
hc_tooltip(
    headerFormat = "",
    pointFormat = "<b>{point.Tool}:</b> {point.name}"
  ) %>%
  hc_colors(special_palette)%>%
  hc_add_theme(my_theme)%>%
  hc_title(text = "Core Skills Visualized")



````
